text.div:
This code system https://terminology.smarthealth.cards/CodeSystem/designation-use defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
consumer-friendly Consumer friendlyIndicates the display name for a term that should be shown to consumers (e.g., to identify a vaccine in a SHC wallet app's user interface).

name: DesignationUse
title: SMART Health Card Terminology Designation Use
description: Identifies the designation would be used SMART Health Card terminology

concept.definition: Indicates the display name for a term that should be shown to consumers (e.g., to identify a vaccine in a SHC wallet app's user interface).
